pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The texmathml library provides functions to convert LaTeX math formulas to presentation MathML. It supports basic LaTeX and AMS extensions, and it can parse and apply LaTeX macros.
Use the @test@ flag to install a standalone executable, @texmath@, that reads a LaTeX formula from @stdin@ and writes MathML to @stdout@.
Use the @cgi@ flag to install a cgi script, @texmath-cgi@.
